## EdgeMaterial class

Material designed to render the edges of extruded buildings using GL\_LINES. It supports solid colors, vertex colors, color mixing and distance fading.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EdgeMaterial extends THREE.RawShaderMaterial implements FadingFeature, ExtrusionFeature, DisplacementFeature 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(params)](./harp-materials.edgematerial._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new <code>EdgeMaterial</code>. |
